### sendUnifiedNotification

```typescript
export async function sendUnifiedNotification(
    client: any,
    logger: Logger,
    config: PluginConfig,
    state: SessionState,
    sessionId: string,
    pruneToolIds: string[],
    toolMetadata: Map<string, ToolParameterEntry>,
    reason: PruneReason | undefined,
    params: any,
    workingDirectory: string,
    distillation?: string[],
): Promise<boolean>
```
